�Hugar�


   Hugar was outraged with Blacknightmare, "Nervous! Nervous, who said I was 
Nervous. I am Outraged!  I finished working on the computer, I ask for the 
History than I call you on the com and I ask if I could scout so I could go 
learn the land near here, so if we ever get in a battle here I can be a help 
to my team.  So why are you being so mean and rude?"  Hugar was ready to 
shoot Blacknightmare, but he didn't.  He just stood there waiting for 
Blacknightmare to get over this feeling that he put a bomb down. How would 
she know unless she is psychic or something.
